nodes.text: The Crescent of Service was a type of award given by the Galactic Republic for valorous deeds, though it was a lesser award than the Medal of Bravery.

The Crescent of Service is mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic at the conclusion of the Jedi Knight storyline, but only if the player makes the dark side alignment choices on Corellia. Otherwise, Var Suthra recommends the player for the Medal of Bravery.
